fullname: Prophet Muḥammad, peace and blessings be upon him

info: Father of ʿAʾishah bint Abi Bakr and the first caliph in Islam
The second caliph in Islam
notes: Not directly from the prophet ﷺto umar to aishah

info: Brother of Ḥafṣah bint ʿUmar, another wife of the Prophet ﷺ

notes: 10504, 10567, 11455 were not originally listed as students - I added them to the specified_students list.

fullname: Umm al-Muʿminīn Umm Ḥabībah Ramlah bint Abi Sufyān
searchname: Umm Ḥabībah Ramlah bint Abi Sufyan
info: Wife of the Prophet ﷺand daught of Abi Sufyān
Daughter of the Prophet and step-daughter of ʿAʾishah bint Abi Bakr
Sister of ʿAʾishah bint Abi Bakr
Nephew of ʿAʾishah bint Abi Bakr
Niece of ʿĀʾishah bint Abi Bakr
notes: she also had a lot of students, try to find some who narrated from her aishah-narrated hadiths. https://isnad.io/rawi/10504,

info: Nephew of ʿAʾishah bint Abi Bakr

fullname: Ḥafṣah bint ʿAbdur-Raḥmān ibn Abi Bakr
searchname: Hafsah bint Abdur-Rahman ibn Abi Bakr
info: Granddaughter of Abu Bakr and therefore the niece of ʿĀʾishah

fullname: Fāṭimah bint al-Munthir ibn al-Zubayr ibn al-ʿAwwām
searchname: Fatimah bint al-Munthir ibn al-Zubayr ibn al-Awwam
info: Wife of Hishām ibn ʿUrwah ibn al-Zubayr and great-niece of ʿĀʾishah bint Abi Bakr
notes: this hadith also traces back to asma, who narrates part of what aishah says

fullname: ʿAbdur-Raḥmān ibn al-Qāsim ibn Muḥammad ibn Abi Bakr
searchname: Abdur-Rahman ibn al-Qasim ibn Muhammad ibn Abi Bakr
info: Son of al-Qāsim ibn Muḥammad and great-nephew of ʿAʾishah bint Abi Bakr

fullname: al-Qāsim ibn Muḥammad ibn Abi Bakr
searchname: al-Qasim ibn Muhammad ibn Abi Bakr
info: Nephew of ʿAʾishah bint Abi Bakr

fullname: Abu Salamah ibn ʿAbdur-Raḥmān ibn ʿAwf
searchname: Abu Salamah ibn Abdur-Rahman ibn Awf
hadiths: https://isnad.io/hadith/178, https://isnad.io/hadith/165, https://isnad.io/hadith/4593, https://isnad.io/hadith/3618, https://isnad.io/hadith/4117, https://isnad.io/hadith/1908

info: Servant of Umm Salamah and the mother of the famous scholar, Al-Hasan Al-Baṣri

fullname: Saʿīd ibn al-Musayyib ibn Ḥazn al-Qurashi al-Makhzūmi
searchname: Said ibn al-Musayyib ibn Hazn al-Qurashi al-Makhzumi
info: One of the Seven Jurists (Fuqahāʿ) of Medina
notes: he learned from many female teachers too. https://www.instagram.com/p/CkUtdYkDmzj/

fullname: Muḥammad ibn Muslim ibn ʿUbaydullāh ibn ʿAbdullāh ibn Shihāb al-Zuhri
searchname: Muhammad ibn Muslim ibn Ubaydullah ibn Abdullah ibn Shihab al-Zuhri
notes: (aka muhammad ibn muslim) via Urwah ibn az-zubayr, https://isnad.io/hadith/35 https://www.instagram.com/p/Cig6XMPAUHe/

fullname: Nāfiʿ Abu ʿAbdullāh Mawlā Ibn ʿUmar
searchname: Nafi Abu Abdullah Mawla Ibn Umar
info: Servant of ʿAbdullāh ibn ʿUmar
Son of Khayrah Umm al-Hasan al-Baṣri, and famous scholar from Iraq

fullname: Hishām ibn ʿUrwah ibn az-Zubayr ibn al-ʿAwwām
searchname: Hisham ibn Urwah ibn az-Zubayr ibn al-Awwam
info: Son of ʿUrwah ibn al-Zubayr and great-nephew of ʿAʾishah bint Abi Bakr
8th century author of the famous Sīrat Rasūlullah, a biography of the Prophet Muḥammad ﷺ

fullname: Sālim ibn Abi Umayyah Abi an-Naḍr
searchname: Salim ibn Abi Umayyah Abi an-Nadr

info: Nephew of ʿAʾishah bint Ṭalḥah
Founder of one of the four legal schools of thought in Sunni Islam
Founder of one of the four legal schools of thought in Sunni Islam: the Hanbali mathhab

fullname: Manṣūr ibn ʿAbdur-Raḥmān ibn Wahb ibn ʿUthmān ibn Ṭalḥah
